title: Understanding the Domain of a Quadratic Function

title: Finding the Range in a Downward Opening Parabola
text: For $$`f(x)=-5x^2+9x-1`$$, what is the vertex form of the quadratic equation, and how does it indicate whether the parabola opens upward or downward?

title: Vertex and Maximum Point
text: The coefficient of $$`x^2`$$ is negative. What does this tell you about the direction of opening of the parabola and the nature of the vertex?

title: Calculating the Vertex
text: To find the vertex, use the formula $$`x=\frac{-b}{2a}`$$. After finding `x`, substitute it back to find the `y` value, giving you the coordinates of the vertex.
